channel.title: Howdo i take donator out?
channel.description:
i was just wondering how to take the donator option out of my server. I have a shop that says youmust be a donator to access it but i would like it gone please help. :confused:
i was also wondering how to fix items i have some phats and santas that when you click to wear them they go into the wepon slot can you please help me on this too. thanks
thanks smerf45. :)

item.title: Howdo i take donator out?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

First thing, in client.java serchthe shop id from shops.cfg and change it and such.
Second, go into items.java and add the id to the right thing for it to equip right:)
Hope this has helped.

          -Demon

Read full topic
